html: The Lord says that before the infant can cry "mother" or "father," the prophecy will be fulfilled. That would be two or three years at the most. Assyria's conquest of Israel took place within three years of the beginning of the reign of Ahaz (see note on Isaiah 7:14), so this prophecy was literally fulfilled. Since the longer time period of a child's accountability was used in Isaiah 7:16, it is assumed that the giving of this prophecy followed that one chronologically.
